headerText: The `v-snackbar` component is used to display a quick message to a user. Snackbars support positioning, removal delay and callbacks.

usage.desc: `v-snackbar`'s in their simplest form display a temporary and closable notification for the user.

multi-line.desc: The `multi-line` property extends the height of the `v-snackbar` to give you a little more room for content.

timeout.desc: The `timeout` property lets you customize the delay before the `v-snackbar` is hidden.

vertical.desc: The `vertical` property allows you to stack the content of your `v-snackbar`.

contextual.desc: You can also apply a color to the snackbar to better fit your implementation.

props.multiLine: Gives the snack a larger minimum height.
props.timeout: Time (in milliseconds) to wait until snackbar is automatically hidden.  Use 0 to keep open indefinitely.
props.vertical: Stacks snackbar content on top of the actions (button).
